subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic struggled with his serve before beating the Italian qualifier Flavio Cipolla, 6-3, 6-2, in the first round of the Dubai Tennis Championships. Djokovic broke Cipolla in the second game of the first set, but Cipolla broke back in the fifth. Djokovic found his game after that and was rarely challenged.
